mapper.sql: id, plid, workhours, overhours, pay, date, status,bonus
mapper.select: select t.*, pt.id as ptid,pt.name as ptname from productlabor_time t left outer join productlaborinfo pt on t.plid=pt.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, pt.id as ptid,pt.name as ptname from productlabor_time t left outer join productlaborinfo pt on t.plid=pt.id where pt.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 order by t.date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, pt.id as ptid,pt.name as ptname from productlabor_time t left outer join productlaborinfo pt on t.plid=pt.id where t.status=0 order by t.date desc
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}

select t.*, pt.id as ptid,pt.name as ptname from productlabor_time t left outer join productlaborinfo pt on t.plid=pt.id where t.plid=#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0 order by t.date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, pt.id as ptid,pt.name as ptname from productlabor_time t left outer join productlaborinfo pt on t.plid=pt.id where t.date > #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.date < #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=0 order by t.date desc
select count(*) from productlabor_time t left outer join productlaborinfo pt on t.plid=pt.id where pt.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0
select count(*) from productlabor_time where status=0
mapper.insert: insert into productlabor_time (id, plid, workhours, overhours, pay, date, status,bonus) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{labor.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workhours,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{overhours,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bonus,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

insert into productlabor_time
id,
plid,
workhours,
overhours,
pay,
date,
status,
bonus,

mapper.update:
update productlabor_time
plid = #{labor.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
workhours = #{workhours,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
overhours = #{overhours,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pay = #{pay,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bonus = #{bonus,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update productlabor_time set plid = #{labor.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, workhours = #{workhours,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, overhours = #{overhours,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pay = #{pay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bonus = #{bonus,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
